DOC.brief_summary: Comparison lung function response tiotropium inhalation solution Spiriva HandiHaler .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Comparison Tiotropium Inhalation Solution ( Respimat Inhaler ) Spiriva HandiHaler Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD )
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis COPD FEV1 < 60 % predict FEV1 < 70 % FVC Smoking history 10 packyears Significant disease COPD Recent history MI ( 1 year less ) Cardiac arrhythmia require drug therapy History asthma , allergic rhinitis eosinophil count > 600 mm3 Symptomatic prostatic hypertrophy bladder neck obstruction Known narrowangle glaucoma Abnormal baseline hematology , blood chemistry urinalysis History cancer within last 5 year Lifethreatening pulmonary obstruction Cystic fibrosis bronchiectasis Tuberculosis Pulmonary resection
